column4: Is it possible to load two different apps in wine, on the same virtual desktop?  I'm trying to load vent, and a game, and cant figure out how to load both.
Of course you can it will be pretty cpu intensive but of course
currently, I have a script as described on wine FAQ, when i run it, the first app loads fine, but the second will not load until the first one is closed
excuse the enter..how do I run them both together?
